T02D2027:115a-1: rakta ya m'a ri mandala p'u dza bidhi n'a ma /
T02D2027:115a-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2027:115a-4: gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2027:115b-0: @115b ya th'a hi dz'a ta m'a tre na sna pi ta /
T02D2027:115b-1: sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she kam sa ma y'a shri ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-5: rkang pa kha bshal ba'i sngags so //
T02D2027:115b-6: aom na mo bha ga w'a ti pushpa ke tu
T02D2027:115b-7: r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga ta y'arha tes myaksam
T02D2027:115b-9: aom pushpe pushpe ma h'a pushpe /
T02D2027:115b-15: zhes pas gtor ma byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2027:115b-16: aom ya m'anta kam sarba bighn'a nutsh'a da ya h'um phat /
T02D2027:115b-17: ces pa'i sngags kyi me tog dang //
T02D2027:115b-18: chu lag pa'i nang du bzung ste /
T02D2027:115b-19: sa la bran pa ni bgegs bskrad pa'o //
T02D2027:115b-20: aom hr'i:ha:bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gatstsha sm'a ta
T02D2027:115b-21: p'u dza pra ti grihna pra s'a dha mam ku
T02D2027:115b-22: ru sv'a h'a / zhes pas spyan drang ngo //
T02D2027:115b-23: aom hr'i:shtri:ha zhes pas yon chab bo //
T02D2027:115b-24: aom a'a: h'um phat ces pas zhal bsil lo //
T02D2027:115b-25: aom dushta satva da ma ka ga:zhes pas dri chab kyi sngags so //
T02D2027:115b-26: aom badzra bh'u mi h'um phat /
T02D2027:115b-27: aom badzra go ma ya h'um phat /
T02D2027:115b-30: aom badzra re khe h'um phat /
T02D2027:115b-31: ces pa'i sngags rnams kyis mandala byi dor bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2027:115b-32: yang lag pa g-yon pas me tog blangs la /
T02D2027:115b-33: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga t'a dhi tishthantu sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-35: phyi nas tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sa bon gyis bkug ste /
T02D2027:115b-36: mandala gyi dbus su bsams nas /
T02D2027:115b-38: aom bha ga w'an shr'i mam rakta ya m'anta ka badzra pushpa a'a:h'um pra tishtha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-39: aom bha ga wa ti shr'i mam badzra be t'a li badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsgoms nas mchod pa bya ba ni /
T02D2027:115b-41: aom r'a g'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-42: aom mo h'anta ba ti badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-43: aom mah'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-44: aom pi shu n'anta krita badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-45: aom dve sh'anta krita badzra pushpa a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-46: aom airshya ra t'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-47: aom mo ha ra t'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-48: aom dve sha ra t'i badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-49: aom airshya rat'i badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-50: aom danda ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:115b-51: aom mung+ga ra ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:116a-1: badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:116a-2: aom khang+ga ya m'anta ka badzra pushpe a'a:h'um pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:116a-3: aom ku m'a ra r'u pi ni dza:dza: h'um phat /
T02D2027:116a-4: me tog dbul ba'i sngags so //
T02D2027:116a-5: aom d'i pta lo tsa ni bi kri t'a na na ma h'a tt'atta /
T02D2027:116a-6: h'a sa n'a di ni d'ipta d'ipt'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:116a-10: aom k'a la r'u ba sarba dusht'am sa tva da
T02D2027:116a-11: ma kam ma h'a bh'u ta pa ti ai mam
T02D2027:116a-12: ba lim gri hna pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:116a-14: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2027:116a-15: gshin rje gshed dgyes 'jigs pa po //
T02D2027:116a-16: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02D2027:116a-17: sku yi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2027:116a-18: ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2027:116a-19: gshin rje gshed dgyes 'jigs pa po //
T02D2027:116a-20: sems kyi rdo rje so sor gsal //
T02D2027:116a-21: rin chen rdo rje phyag 'chal bstod //
T02D2027:116a-22: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2027:116a-24: gsung kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog / gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2027:116a-25: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2027:116a-26: gshin rje gshed po las thams cad //
T02D2027:116a-27: sku yi rdo rje so sor ston //
T02D2027:116a-28: lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2027:116a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2027:116a-30: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa /
T02D2027:116a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'chal bstod //
T02D2027:116a-32: ces pa tshigs su bcad pa lngas bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2027:116a-35: bi shva r'u pa dha ri gatstsha gatstsha /
T02D2027:116a-36: sva bh'a wa nam kri te na /
T02D2027:116a-37: ta th'a ga t'am shtsa sarba buddh'a shtsa bi sar dza ya ma ma k'aryam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2027:116a-38: gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so //
T02D2027:116a-40: mu ni mu ni pu na r'a ga ma n'a ya mu: pu na ra /
T02D2027:116a-41: bi ma da nu kamp'a dv'a m'a ga mishyanta p'a d'a:/
T02D2027:116a-42: zhes pa 'di yis mandala yang dag par bsdus te /
T02D2027:116a-43: mchod rdzas kun brjes la dor ro //
T02D2027:116a-44: rnal 'byor pas 'od kyi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms te /
T02D2027:116a-45: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rang gi snying gar sa bon bsgoms te /
T02D2027:116a-46: de'i rjes su yi ge brgya pa'i gzungs ni /
T02D2027:116a-47: aom ya m'anta ka sa ma ya /
T02D2027:116a-49: ya m'anta ka tve no pa tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2027:116a-50: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2027:116a-51: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2027:116a-52: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2027:116b-1: sarba karm'a su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru
T02D2027:116b-2: h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'an sarba
T02D2027:116b-3: ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha
T02D2027:116b-4: ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: zhes pas
T02D2027:116b-5: yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so //
T02D2027:116b-6: 'di brjod nas 'dod pa'i lha'i nga rgyal gyis ji lta bar gnas pa bya'o //
T02D2027:116b-7: gshin rje gshed dmar po mandala du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2027:116b-8: dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2027:116b-10: // / lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i sh'akya'i dge
T02D2027:116b-11: slong nyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar
